item.title: Mentios 718/ Release
item.dc:creator: @AlterOPSnet AlterOPSnet
item.description:
@AlterOPSnet wrote:

[quote=“mike4ever, post:45, topic:479515”][quote author=AlterOPSnet link=topic=597751.msg4209997#msg4209997 date=1359405811]
Run.bat:

@echo off
title Mentios RSPS 43594
“C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx1024m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

My own Cmpiler Version
Compiler.bat:

@echo off
title Compiler
echo Building…
echo Please be patient and wait.
“C:/Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp data/libs/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java
echo ² 10% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:/Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09/bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp data/libs/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/.java
echo ² ² 20% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java
echo ² ² ² 30% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Equipment.java
echo ² ² ² ² 40% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java
echo ² ² ² ² ² 50% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/.java
echo ² ² ² ² ² ² 60% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java
echo ² ² ² ² ² ² ² 70% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/.java
echo ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² 80% Completed
echo=================================================
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java
echo ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² 90% Completed
echo=================================================
echo Packing all files
echo ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² ² 100% Completed
echo=================================================
@echo Build all Successfully
pause
[/quote]

Which cache did you use? The regular matrix one?[/quote]
yes

item.title: Mentios 718/ Release
item.dc:creator: @AlterOPSnet AlterOPSnet
item.description:
@AlterOPSnet wrote:

[quote=“rexboys10, post:39, topic:479515”][quote author=AlterOPSnet link=topic=597751.msg4209890#msg4209890 date=1359393603]

Dude tell me than how can i add Ge back And wildy, it says player isnt in wildy. please the server is great but thats the only problem i have.

go into NPCHandle.jar and add this codes

			else if(npc.getId() == 1419)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2240)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2241)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2593)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if (npc.getId() == 13335)

[/quote]

THANK YOU VERY MUCH!! AND HOW CAN I ADD WILDY DO YOU KNOW THAT?[/quote]
Wilderness?

Read full topic

item.title: Mentios 718/ Release
item.dc:creator: @AlterOPSnet AlterOPSnet
item.description:
@AlterOPSnet wrote:

rexboys10:

Dude tell me than how can i add Ge back And wildy, it says player isnt in wildy. please the server is great but thats the only problem i have.

go into NPCHandle.jar and add this codes

			else if(npc.getId() == 1419)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2240)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2241)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if(npc.getId() == 2593)
			 ExchangeHandler.mainInterface(player);
			else if (npc.getId() == 13335)
